Instuctions.....
1.download torrent
2.go to folder where it was downloaded to
3.look for file called "fw-codbo.rar"
4.extract the file using IZARC or any other extracting program
5.then go to that folder and there should be two files
6.both files named "fw-codbo" one file is 1kb the other is 7.6 gbs
7.depending on what version of ixtreme you have skip to step 9
8.i have ixtreme 1.2 so used a 360 wave patcher to patch the game down to wave 2 (cod bo is wave 6)
9.use imgburn and go to settings/write/ then make sure layerbreak is set to 1913760
10.burn the game at 2x speed and let it verify
11.play it OFFLINE!!!!!!!
